name: Converse Run Star Hike Hi Black White Gum

details.description:
Inspired by hiking boots, the spiked rubber sole on the Converse Run Star Hike Hi Black White Gum turns this footwear into a piece of abstract art. The rest of the silhouette offers a thick white sole and a minimalist black-and-white design that's reminiscent of the original Chuck Taylor All Star. On the heel, this sneaker displays a chunky white star embedded into the black rubber sole.

The Converse Run Star Hike Hi Black White Gum released in December of 2019 and retailed for $100.

name: Converse Run Star Hike Ox Black White Gum

details.description: The Converse Run Star Hike Ox Black White Gum is a stylish and versatile sneaker that combines the classic Converse design with modern features. The upper is made of durable canvas material, while the sole is made of a unique blend of rubber and foam for added comfort and support. The black and white colorway is timeless and easy to pair with any outfit, while the gum sole adds a touch of retro flair. Released on July 22, 2020, the Converse Run Star Hike Ox Black White Gum is priced at $105, making it an affordable option for those looking for a high-quality sneaker. The shoe is available in a range of sizes, ensuring a comfortable fit for everyone. Something we love about the Converse Run Star Hike Ox Black White Gum is its ability to seamlessly blend classic and modern design elements. Our experts think the best features of this shoe are its durable canvas upper, comfortable rubber and foam sole, and versatile black and white colorway. The standout feature of the Converse Run Star Hike Ox Black White Gum is its unique gum sole, which adds a touch of retro style to the overall design. Our experts especially love how easy it is to pair this sneaker with any outfit, making it a great addition to any wardrobe.

name: Converse Run Star Hike Hi Triple Black Leather
Converse Run Star Hike Ox White Black Gum

details.description:
The Converse Run Star Hike Ox White Black Gum is a reimagined version of the classic Chuck Taylor All Star.

A low-top sneaker, this shoe features a canvas upper highlighted with white stitching, metallic eyelets, and a rubber toe cap, details that stay true to the original Chucks. The upper for the White Black Gum Converse Run Star Hike Ox sits atop a chunky platform made with SmartFOAM® insoles that increase the shoe’s comfort level without adding any weight. Rounding off the design for this shoe is a two-tone rubber outsole and a rounded heel with a Star logo. Its outsole is split into two. Each half, hardened for durability, features rugged treads for improved traction.

The fashion-forward design of the Converse Run Star Hike Ox White Black Gum is what we find most exciting about this shoe. We also love that this shoe, released on July 22nd, 2020, for $105, is just as functional as it is appealing.

name: Converse Run Star Hike Hi White Black Gum

details.description:
The Converse Run Star Hike Hi White Black Gum features a clean white canvas upper with black accents and a thick white and gum sole. On the left side, the fabric is blank except for the stitches. The right side displays the iconic Chuck Taylor All Star logo as a tribute to the shoe that made Converse a household name, complemented by the white Converse logo on the insole. Unlike most sneakers, which have a single sole at the bottom, the Converse Run Star Hike Hi White Black Gum silhouette offers two spiky soles with a gap in the middle.

The Converse Run Star Hike Hi White Black Gum released in December of 2019 and retailed for $100.

Converse Run Star Hike Hi Keith Haring Black

details.description: The Converse Run Star Hike Hi Keith Haring Black is a limited edition sneaker that combines the iconic design of Converse with the vibrant artwork of Keith Haring. The upper is made of black canvas with a bold print of Haring's signature figures in white, red, and yellow. The shoe features a chunky platform sole with a jagged tread pattern that provides excellent traction and durability. The midsole is made of foam for added comfort and support. This sneaker was released on May 13, 2021, and retails for $120. It is available in both men's and women's sizes. The Converse Run Star Hike Hi Keith Haring Black is a unique and eye-catching shoe that is perfect for anyone who wants to make a statement with their footwear. The combination of Converse's classic design and Keith Haring's bold artwork creates a shoe that is both stylish and functional. Something we love about the Converse Run Star Hike Hi Keith Haring Black is the attention to detail in the design. The print of Haring's figures is bold and vibrant, and the chunky platform sole adds a modern twist to the classic Converse silhouette. Our experts think the standout feature of the Converse Run Star Hike Hi Keith Haring Black is the combination of style and functionality. The shoe is not only visually striking but also provides excellent traction and support. Overall, we love the Converse Run Star Hike Hi Keith Haring Black for its unique design and practicality.

name: Converse Run Star Hike Hi JW Anderson Black

details.description: Run and never look back after copping the Converse Run Star Hike Hi JW Anderson Black. This Converse comes with a black upper plus white accents, white midsole, and a white sole plus brown and black accents. These sneakers released in April 2019 and retailed for $140. Classic chucks are the vibe so cop now on StockX.

Converse Run Star Hike Hi Dark Smoke Grey
Converse Run Star Hike Platform Liverpool F.C
Converse Run Star Hike Pride (2021)

details.description:
The Converse Run Star Hike Pride (2021) is a sneaker that was released to honor the LGBTQ+ community and to celebrate individuality and inclusivity.

The upper of the Run Star Hike Pride (2021) is made of a sturdy canvas material that is lightweight and breathable. The shoe features a rainbow gradient pattern across the heel and a rainbow star on the Converse branding. The laces also come in a rainbow pattern further adding to the shoe's theme.

We think that the most distinct feature of the Converse Run Star Hike Pride (2021) is its chunky sole. The sole is raised and features a jagged tooth-like pattern on the bottom that provides excellent traction and durability. It also features a jagged sole extension at the back of the heel that adds extra support and stability, making it ideal for hiking and other outdoor activities. The shoe debuted on May 13th, 2021, at a retail value of $115.
